title: Default map to today's data with search button

requirements.text: Set the map date range filter to default to today's date (both 'from' and 'to' set to current date) when the MapPage initially loads

quotes: in map show by default today

acceptanceCriteria: When MapPage loads, the date range inputs show today's date
Map displays only parties with visits from today by default
No user interaction required to see today's data

requirements.text: Add a search button next to the date range inputs that triggers the map data filter when clicked

quotes: if choose 1 date and click on search button then show data

acceptanceCriteria: A search button appears in the MapPage date filter controls
Clicking the search button updates the map with the selected date range
Map data only updates when the search button is clicked, not automatically on date input change

constraints: Preserve existing date range filter UI components in MapPage
Maintain compatibility with existing useMapLocationData hook
nonGoals: Changing the map marker clustering behavior
Adding date validation beyond what already exists
